sentences.sContent: We decided to have a picnic down by the lake.
There is free parking for visitors, as well as a restaurant and picnic area (= a special area with tables where people can have a picnic ) .
sentences.sCn: 除了餐厅和野餐区，我们还为游客提供免费停车位。

sentences.sContent: The area is very popular with picnickers.
sentences.sCn: 那个地区很受野餐者的欢迎。

sentences.sContent: ...This picnic should beat the last one we went to...

trans.tranOther: if you have a picnic, you take food and eat it outdoors, especially in the country
